edu.smu.tspell.wordnet
Interface AdjectiveSynset

All Superinterfaces:
Synset
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdjectiveSatelliteSynset
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjectiveReferenceSynset, AdjectiveSatelliteReferenceSynset
public interface AdjectiveSynset
extends Synset

Represents a synset that corresponds to an adjective meaning.

This interface includes the definition of position constants used to indicate the valid position(s) where a given word form within the synset may occur within a sentence.

See Also:
Five Papers on WordNet ("Adjectives in WordNet")

Method Detail

getRequiredPosition

public String getRequiredPosition(String wordForm)
Returns the position that the specified adjective word form must occupy relative to a nount it modifies.

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to return the required position.
Returns:
Position at which the word must occur or null if there is no restriction on its position. If a restriction does exist, the value will correspond to the one the restriction constants, specifically PREDICATE_POSITION, PRENOMINAL_POSITION, or IMMEDIATELY_POSTNOMINAL_POSITION.

getSimilar

public AdjectiveSynset[] getSimilar()
                             throws WordNetException
Returns the synsets, if any, with similar meaning. When this method is called for a head synset it will return the corresponding satellites; conversely, when called for a satellite synset this method will return the head synset.

For example, "abridged" is similar to "shortened".

Returns:
The synsets representing meanings similar to this one.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getParticiple

public WordSense getParticiple(String wordForm)
                        throws WordNetException
The verb from which the adjective was derived if one exists.

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to return the verb participle.
Returns:
Verb participle (the root verb from which the specified word form was derived.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getPertainyms

public WordSense[] getPertainyms(String wordForm)
                          throws WordNetException
Returns the pertainyms (words from which a word in this synset was derived) associated with a word form in this synset.

For example, a pertainym of "academic" is "academia".

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to return pertainyms.
Returns:
The pertainyms of this synset or null.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getAttributes

public NounSynset[] getAttributes()
                           throws WordNetException
Returns the synsets of which this adjective concept is an attribute.

For example, "accurate" is an attribute of "truth".

Returns:
Synsets of which this adjective concept is an attribute.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getRelated

public AdjectiveSynset[] getRelated()
                             throws WordNetException
Returns the synsets representing related ("see also") concepts.

For example, "aggressive" is related to "hostile".

Returns:
Synsets representing concepts related to this one.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getTopics

public NounSynset[] getTopics()
                       throws WordNetException
Identifies the topics with which this synset is associated.

For example, "acidic" is within the domain of "chemistry".

Returns:
Topics / subjects associated with this synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getRegions

public NounSynset[] getRegions()
                        throws WordNetException
Identifies the regions with which this synset is associated.

For example, "al dente" is within the domain of "Italy".

Returns:
Regions associated with this synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getUsages

public NounSynset[] getUsages()
                       throws WordNetException
Identifies the usage types associated with this synset.

For example, "hot under the collar" is a "colloquialism".

Returns:
Usage types associated with this synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

isHeadSynset

public boolean isHeadSynset()
                     throws WordNetException
Indicates whether this is a head synset or a satellite synset.

Returns:
true if this a head synset or false if it is a satellite synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.
See Also:
AdjectiveSatelliteSynset, getSimilar()
